Packages that use Replicator.Writer
Package
Description
org.cojen.tupl.repl
General-purpose Raft-based replication system, intended for supporting fully replicated databases.

    Methods in org.cojen.tupl.repl that return Replicator.Writer
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Replicator.Writer
    Replicator.newWriter()
    Returns a new writer for the leader to write into, or else returns null if the local member isn't the leader.
    Replicator.Writer
    Replicator.newWriter(long position)
    Returns a new writer for the leader to write into, or else returns null if the local member isn't the leader.
